roleset.name: to count or estimate incorrectly
roleset.note: MISCALCULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'miscalculate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from miscalculate.01-v predicate notes)
MISCALCULATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Comparison to miscalculate.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from miscalculation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But Mr. Bush and his advisers miscalculated the politics of the abortion issue , [*-2] failing [*-3]to grasp how dramatically the abortion-rights movement would be aroused [*-1] [*T*-4] following last summer 's Supreme Court decision [*] to restrict those rights in the Webster case .
example.arg: the politics of the abortion issue

[*-2] failing [*-3]to grasp how dramatically the abortion-rights movement would be aroused [*-1] [*T*-4] following last summer 's Supreme Court decision [*] to restrict those rights in the Webster case

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: When the market opened at 9:30 a.m. EST [*T*-1] , a reporter for the Reuters newswire miscalculated the industrial average 's drop as a 4 % decline when it really was down 0.7 % [*T*-2].
example.arg: When the market opened at 9:30 a.m. EST [*T*-1]
a reporter for the Reuters newswire

example.text: The military authorities' miscalculation of the situation led to war.
